channel.title: Client problem pls help
channel.description: i got a source + client and when i try to login it says "error can't connect to server" so someone told me i have to switch the server ip in client.java, i tried the code server = "127.0.0.1"; and when i compiled i got an error so i deleted it. so basically my problem is i cant connect to server when i try to login can u fix that please
